title: Contextual Participatory Learning Design: Problem-Based Project Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic learning skills and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Need to establish a learner-led situational design and peer assessment system

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously design three problem frames based on real-world cases.
Learners can generate five contextual linkages connected to academic disciplines through collaboration with peers.
Learners can complete two-week project outcomes applying generated frames and incorporate peer feedback.
Learners can analytically report three points of confusion encountered during participation using assessment rubrics.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
